a.detail: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls
a.summary: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls

c.detail:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 10 save or be teleported to another location

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a mine. It was eventually overrun by demons, and has been conquered and altered many times since then.

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Iron Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

1700 cp, 700 sp, 70 gp, a lacquered wooden comb engraved with elven script (25 gp), a linen mantle trimmed with rabbit fur (25 gp), a set of ivory dice with copper pips (25 gp), an earthenware plate painted with floral imagery (25 gp), an earthenware vase painted with pastoral imagery (25 gp), Spell Scroll (Searing Smite) (common, dmg 200), 2 x Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
trap:
Chain Flail: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    initiative +1, 1 attack per round, +6 to hit against all targets within 5 ft., 2d10 bludgeoning damage

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.2: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.3: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 4 x Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); deadly, 200 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.4: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.5: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.6: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33); medium, 200 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
